title: Revealed: How much the government's spending on AI
description: The government is betting big on artificial intelligence to boost productivity and efficiency, ultimately saving money for taxpayers. But Sky News find some departments are falling behind.
content:
Sir Keir Starmer says AI will improve public services, put money in your pocket, create jobs and improve your children's future.
Politicians are betting the house on it - but how much are they actually spending? And on what?

title: Artificial Intelligence Deals Fuel Market Gains Amid Economic Uncertainty
description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq saw gains driven by AI-related deals despite unclear monetary policy and scarce economic data. Amazon's collaboration with OpenAI and Nvidia's restricted chip exports contributed to the rally. Meanwhile, conflicting Fed views and a significant acquisition by Kimberly-Clark stirred investor attention.
